articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Italian Businessman
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Italian Businessman
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday met Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Italian Businessman
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Italian Businessman
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the group, conveyed the gift to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Saturday.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Feted
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Feted
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A reception for overseas Koreans was given at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday to celebrate the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung)
					 Present there on invitation were congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and China for celebrating the Day of the Sun, a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. and other overseas Koreans delegations and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Chol, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jin Guk, director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol in a speech said that President Kim Il Sung built the country, once eclipsed on the world map, into a dignified invincible power of Juche, the people's country.
					
					 He expressed firm belief that the overseas Koreans would turn out as one in the patriotic great advance to bring earlier the new morning of national reunification on this land as desired by the great leaders, true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, in a speech said that Generalissimo Kim Il Sung formed the first overseas compatriots organization of Juche type and led them along a genuine patriotic road.
					
					 He noted that the history of the noble patriotism and compatriotic feelings of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is given steady continuity along with the history of the Juche-based overseas compatriots movement as it is led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Communist Party of Cuba
articles.content:
Greetings to Communist Party of Cuba
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Saturday sent a message of greeting to the 7th Congress of the Communist Party of Cuba.
					 The message expressed belief that the congress would mark an important occasion in the struggle of the party and people to strengthen the party, defend the gains of the revolution and build prosperous socialist Cuba.
					
					 Expressing conviction that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and the peoples of the two countries established in the joint struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism would steadily consolidate and develop in the future, too, the message sincerely wished the congress big success in its work.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Bound to Meet Final End: CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Bound to Meet Final End: CPRK Secretariat
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- As reported, the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, the conservative ruling party, suffered a heavy defeat and the opposition forces held the overwhelming upper hand at the puppet "National Assembly" election held in south Korea on April 13.
					 To say nothing of the majority seats touted by the coteries of the "Saenuri Party", they lost the position of the No.1 party at the "National Assembly" and suffered defeat even in Seoul and the areas they described as power bases, becoming a mourning house.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in information bulletin no. 1104 on Saturday said this is a resolute and stern punishment to Park Geun Hye and the coteries of the "Saenuri Party" going against the south Korean people's mindset and the trend of the times. The bulletin said:
					
					 In the past puppet presidential election the Park group seized power with such deceptive commitments as "people's integrity", "era of people's happiness" and "improvement of south-north relations through trust".
					
					 But the Park group has persisted in revival of "yusin" dictatorship, unpopular rule, confrontation with compatriots in the north and war moves.
					
					 The fascist dark society where even the elementary democratic freedom and rights are trampled down and veritable hell where economy and people's living have been driven into the worst catastrophic phase and huge disastrous incidents, crimes and fin desiecle way of life are prevalent--this is the miserable state of south Korea.
					
					 This time the south Korean people gave vent to the resentment at the Park group of traitors and dealt a deadly sledge hammer to the traitorous regime.
					
					 Park and the "Saenuri Party" sternly punished by the people's mindset have no future and are bound to meet the final ruin.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation headed by Nikolai Zubrilin, member of the Bureau of the Moscow City Committee and deputy to the Moscow City Duma, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President, they looked round the historical relics preserved with much care at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They toured the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also visited the venue of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival, the Sci-Tech Complex, etc.

articles.title: Italian Businessman Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Italian Businessman Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, visited Mangyongdae, the birth place of President Kim Il Sung, on Saturday.
					 He laid a floral basket before the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 He looked round historic relics, being briefed on the story about the revolutionary career of the President and his patriotic revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.

articles.title: IIJI Secretary General Leaves
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), and his party left here on Saturday.
					 A delegation of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism led by Fujio Hanawa, co-representative of the Kanto Liaison Council, left here for home on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighter
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighter
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Ri Yong Suk greeted her centenarian birthday.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to her who has devotedly worked for the party and the leader, the country and its people as befitting the first generation of the revolution.
					
					 She was born in an alien land in Juche 5 (1916) and lived in sorrow as a member of a stateless nation. She embarked upon the road of revolution in her teens, grew up to be a member of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army prepared politically and ideologically under the loving care of President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and took part in the final attack operation for liberating the country.
					
					 She worked hard for the building of a new country and socialist construction and remained loyal to the great leaders while working as official of the party and administration cadre.
					
					 She received Order of Kim Il Sung, the title of labor hero and other party and state commendations.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made sure that Order of Kim Jong Il was awarded to her and invited her to participate in the celebrations of the centenary of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and other major events as delegates.
					
					 The birthday spread sent by Kim Jong Un was conveyed to her on Saturday.

articles.title: DPRK Student Proves Successful at Int'l Program Contest
articles.content:
DPRK Student Proves Successful at Int'l Program Contest
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Mun So Min, a student of Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK, got 1,000 points, the highest mark, at Codechef Internet program contest.
					 The contest, held on April 1-10, brought together 6 370 coders from 80 countries, including Germany, Russia and India.
					
					 Students of the university have participated in Codechef since 2013, winning the titles for 10 times.
					
					 This year alone, they have proved successful at different international program contests like "ByteCode 2016" attended by 282 teams and Indian Programming Community (IPC) ACM ICPC Preparatory Series.

articles.title: Peruvian Female Soloist Popular at Art Festival
articles.content:
Peruvian Female Soloist Popular at Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is now underway here to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15).
					 Among artistes attending the festival is Peruvian female soloist Tuesta Otiniano Rosa Teresa.
					
					 She put on the stage the Korean song "Leader, the Night Is Far Advanced", which was highly acclaimed by audience.
					
					 Tuesta Otiniano Rosa Teresa chose the song with her mother who told her many stories about the DPRK, and began learning the Korean language out of reverence for Kim Il Sung.
					
					 She said that she worried about her premiere, but was greatly applauded by audience, adding: I will attend the next festival with more Korean songs.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Shining in History of Struggles against Imperialism
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Shining in History of Struggles against Imperialism
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly brilliant commander as he defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and performed distinguished feats in the history of anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggles in the 20th century.
					 Many peoples of the world still remember the 1950-1953 Korean War that put the U.S. imperialism, boasting of being the "strongest" in the world, at its evening twilight.
					
					 At that time the U.S. imperialists provoked a war against the DPRK, with reliance in their numerical and technical superiority. But they suffered a bitter defeat in the war by the President's unique military ideas, stratagem, commanding art and matchless pluck.
					
					 With his unique counter-offensive strategy, Kim Il Sung led the Seoul liberation operation to victory just three days after the outbreak of the war. Under his policy of uninterrupted attack operation, the Korean People's Army liberated over 90 percent of the southern part of the country and 92 percent of the population in a little more than a month.
					
					 His military wisdom and Juche-based tactics foiled all the U.S. operational plans such as "general Christmas offensive", "summer and autumn offensives" and "scorched-earth operation".
					
					 Later, Clark, the then commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East and commander of the "UN Forces", wrote that the successes achieved by the Korean People's Army in the last Korean War were ascribable to the experienced command of General Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The DPRK's victory in the war opened up a new era of advance in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle of the world's oppressed nations, giving a great encouragement to them.
					
					 After the Korean War, peoples of Vietnam, Laos and Cambodia had won victories in their resistances against the U.S. imperialists and those of Lebanon and Jordan drove out the aggressors from their territories, while an anti-U.S. struggle was intensified in Cuba and other Latin-American countries.
					
					 That's why the world progressives have praised Kim Il Sung as the iron-willed Songun commander who led the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialist aggressors to the victory and the great hero produced by Heaven.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Pioneer of Independent Politics
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Pioneer of Independent Politics
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- In his lifetime President Kim Il Sung had adhered to independence in politics.
					 He always gave priority to the requirements and interests of the Korean people in adopting any line and policy.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he led the Korean revolution to victory with his steadfast independent politics, clarifying the truth that sovereignty of each nation could be achieved only by its own efforts and struggle.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea from Japan's colonial rule, he enforced the land reform and other democratic reforms in keeping with the country's specific conditions and its people's independent demands and interests.
					
					 He set forth the main line of economic construction in the postwar period, a line of giving priority to the growth of heavy industry while simultaneously developing the light industry and agriculture, to provide a firm guarantee for building an independent national economy.
					
					 When big-power chauvinists forced "integrated economy" upon the DPRK, the President resolutely rejected it and held on to the line of building the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 And proceeding from the Juche-based stand, he advanced the line of building up the nation's economy and defense simultaneously and the line of establishing diplomatic relations on the basis of independence.
					
					 His independent politics had been creditably carried forward in the Songun (military-first) politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the DPRK is now displaying its dignity as an independent power despite the unprecedented sanctions and pressure by the imperialist aggression forces.

articles.title: National Reunification Institute Indicts Park Geun Hye for Turning S. Korea into Human Rights Tundra
articles.content:
National Reunification Institute Indicts Park Geun Hye for Turning S. Korea into Human Rights Tundra
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute issued a white paper Saturday to denounce the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for turning south Korea into the world's worst veritable hell.
					 The white paper cited facts to prove the south Korean economy faced worst crisis, its people is mired in dire destitution, big disasters occur in an unbroken chain and all kinds of crimes, corruption and irregularities are prevalent in south Korea.
					
					 The document said Park Geun Hye pushed the south Korean economy into the worst catastrophic phase, far from achieving "economic prosperity" which she trumpeted about so loudly.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 Due to the conclusion of the humiliating "Free Trade Agreement" 83 percent of trade items of south Korea were nudged out of competition and more than 50 percent of export-oriented businesses are suffering losses. The reeling economies in the neighboring countries caused the export volume of south Korea, a key factor which keeps its economy afloat, undergo a continued dwindling. It showed 12.2 percent cut-down in February this year as against the same month last year.
					
					 The yearly average economic growth rate for the past three years of Park Geun Hye in office failed to reach two thirds of that during the years of Kim Dae Jung and Roh Moo Hyun, far less than that during the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					Big businesses which faced bankruptcy later last year number 54, 37 percent increase from 2012, and the number of big businesses which are not able to pay interests with their own business profits stands at 567. More than 2,000 minor businesses producing export goods went bankrupt en masse which splashed to the overall manufacturing field, leading to the shutdown of over 90 000 minor businesses.
					
					 At present the number of jobless people stands at over 4.5 million or 23.3 percent increase from that three years ago, and the number of underemployed hits 10 million. The jobless rate of young people, in particular, hits the record high of 12.5 percent.
					
					 The total amount of debts of south Korea runs into astronomical figures, the amount its population has to pay for several years without any consumption. 
					
					The shutdown of the Kaesong Industrial Zone put over 6,000 businesses on the verge of bankruptcy and left 124,000 workers unemployed overnight.
					
					 The action taken by south Korea to scuttle the north-south economic cooperation reportedly brought direct or indirect losses worth tens of billions of USD to south Korea.
					
					 During Park Geun Hye's three years of office the south Korean people have been driven into the slough of poverty.
					
					 The absolute paupers in south Korea now number over 5.7 million and there are millions of people who are unable to get rid of poverty no matter how hard they work.
					
					 The gap between the rich and the poor in income has become 12 times wide though it was 8.8 times ten years ago and a handful of the rich holds 45 percent of total income, making south Korea the worst region in Asia in terms of inequality.
					
					 Since Park Geun Hye's assumption of office the whole land of south Korea has been torn with huge disasters and accidents, causing uneasiness and horror among the people.
					
					 A typical example is the sinking of ferry Sewol in April 2014 that shocked the world.
					
					 Last year alone 2 740 cases of ship-related accidents occurred, which is twice as many as that in 2012, leaving 112 dead or missing.
					
					 In less than one year and a half since Park took office, more than 50 big accidents of various kinds occurred.
					
					 Today south Korea tops the world's list of traffic accidents.
					
					The number of workers who suffered due to industrial disaster in 2014 numbered over 240 on a daily average, over 90,000 in total in a year.
					
					 All kinds of crimes, corruptions and irregularities have become endemic in south Korea.
					
					 Since Park's coming to power, the number of crimes of various kinds was recorded over 6 000 on a daily basis and over 2 million on a yearly basis.
					
					 The size of illegal economy relying on prostitution, gambling and drug-trafficking has snowballed to reach 390 billion USD or 26 percent increase from 2012.
					
					The yearly number of those committing suicide is over 15,000, making south Korea top the world list.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group which reduced south Korea into the veritable hell and decadence-infested cesspool is still talking about "human rights" of someone and trumpeting about "economic growth with emphasis on job creation" and "building happy and lively society". But this is the height of impudence and hypocrisy, the white paper stressed.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Validity of DPRK's Measures to Bolster up Nuclear Deterrence for Self-Defence
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Validity of DPRK's Measures to Bolster up Nuclear Deterrence for Self-Defence
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is vociferously terming the DPRK's measures for bolstering up nuclear deterrence as "provocations" in the international arena in a bid to give impression that the former is concerned for scrapping nuclear weapons worldwide.
					 It was censured for its trite shameful behavior at the recent 4th "Nuclear Security Summit" held in Washington and G-7 foreign ministers' meeting in Hiroshima.
					
					 Foreign media are asserting that the DPRK's nuclear program and tests serve as strong deterrence to cope with the U.S. moves for aggression and the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills are harassing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and escalating tensions there.
					
					 A deputy editor of the Egyptian newspaper Al－Ahram Al－Misaiya in a commentary titled "Nuclear security and wrong action of the U.S." said that Washington is pressurizing north Korea by channeling all regional and international efforts while describing its nuclear program as a great danger of security and stability in Southeast Asia and the rest of the world. However, the U.S. is feigning ignorance of Israel's nuclear scenario, claiming that it is designed to achieve peace, he noted, adding: This is nothing but an attempt to convince the world that what north Korea acquired is destructive nuclear weapons but what Israel has in place is nukes for peace. The U.S. administration bereft of impartiality had better review its policy over the sensitive international issues, the issue of global security, in particular.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and joint military drills are the source of pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 It has posed a ceaseless nuclear threat to the DPRK, deploying nuclear weapons in south Korea and staging frantic nuclear war drills against the DPRK for over half a century.
					
					 Even at this time the largest-ever U.S.-south Korea nuclear war saber-rattling is under way in south Korea for invading the DPRK.
					
					 Key Resolve joint military drill, a combined command exercise in which all U.S. man-killing nuclear hardware and special operation forces were involved, came to an end but Foal Eagle 16 joint drill, rehearsal for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK under the simulated conditions of an actual war, is going on.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces staged "operation for advancing into inland depth of the north", "operation for occupying Pyongyang", "beheading operation", etc. in the land and seas by mobilizing special operation forces.
					
					 Their nuclear war rehearsal for aggression clearly proves once again what is the root cause of escalating tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is not a threat but an inevitable self-defensive option for protecting the country and nation from the nuclear disaster to be brought by the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrence is the most just and realistic way for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula, the biggest hotbed in the world.
					
					 The stronger the striking capability of the DPRK's nuclear weapons grows, the more powerful the capability to deter aggression and war will become.
					
					 Nothing can deny the validity of the DPRK's measures to bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspapers Warn Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspapers Warn Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea in an editorial on April 14 reported about the "Saenuri Party's" heavy defeat at the puppet National Assembly election.
					 The party failed to hold the majority of the seats at the "National Assembly", the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The "National Assembly" in which the ruling party holds minority while the opposition party majority has appeared and Park Geun Hye has become unable to avoid the paralysis of ruling power.
					
					 The people's mindset sternly punished the Park Geun Hye regime which deteriorated the people's livelihood and democracy.
					
					 Kukmin Ilbo on the same day said that the people dealt severe punishment to the Park regime by acquiring majority seats at the "National Assembly" to pull down the ruling party from the position of the No. 1 party

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Services Report Ruling Party's Defeat in "National Assembly" Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Services Report Ruling Party's Defeat in "National Assembly" Election
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- South Korean broadcasting services on April 14 simultaneously reported the ruling "Saenuri Party's" defeat in the "National Assembly" election.
					KBS reported that the ruling party's defeat was clearer in the 20th "National Assembly" election in contrast to the 19th and the "National Assembly" power went over to the opposition parties from the ruling party.
					
					Red light is on for the administration of the "government", which will further deteriorate its situation of not being able to pass bills though it held the majority of seats in the "National Assembly," it added.
					
					MBC noted that the Chongwadae was shocked by the defeat of the "Saenuri Party."

articles.title: Letter of Thanks to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter of Thanks to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un on April 16 received a letter of thanks from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) after receiving the educational aid fund and stipends sent by him.
					 The letter said that the educational aid fund and stipends sent by the Marshal this significant year marking the 70th anniversary of the secondary education enforcement and the 60th founding anniversary of Korean University give doubled strength and courage to all the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and greatly encouraged their sacred patriotic movement.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee extends the highest glory and warmest thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un for personally sending an important congratulatory message to the teaching staff and students of Korean University on the occasion of its 60th founding anniversary and showing boundless benevolence for the children of Koreans in Japan once again, reflecting the deep reverence and ardent loyalty of all the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We will further consolidate the Chongryon organization into the Juche-oriented overseas organization shining with the august names of peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, bearing deep in mind the unshakable faith and will that we are sure to win if we are led by the Marshal despite any trials and difficulties.
					
					 We will warmly love and defend our motherland, benevolent embrace of Koreans in Japan, and make a tangible contribution to building the reunified and prosperous strongest power in the three thousand-ri country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in pamphlet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia on April 8 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Romanian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Socialist Party of Romania on its website on April 11.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly defending the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and adding shine to them forever.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Russia
 Moscow, April 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Moscow under the sponsorship of the Russian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) on April 12.
					 Present there were figures of the Russian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Russian Foreign Ministry, the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, the Association of International Peace Fund, the Moscow Peace Fund and the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were a staff member of the DPRK embassy in Moscow and others.
					
					 Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK who doubles as chairman of the Russian preparatory committee, said in a speech:
					
					 We celebrate with splendor the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung, in beautiful spring every year.
					
					 He is the great leader of the Korean people as he was born in the most revolutionary and patriotic family and led the Korean revolution to victory for a long period.
					
					 I still cannot forget the Korean people who had deeply grieved over the great loss of him.
					
					 He was the closest friend of Russia, distinguished leader, great man and elder statesman of the world as he gave the origin of the Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 Vanin, senior researcher of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, noted that the history of the DPRK in the 20th century is the one of the great career of Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people and outstanding leader of the international working class movement and national liberation movement.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo, Stamp and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo, Stamp and Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Russia
Moscow, April 15 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo, stamp and handicraft exhibition was opened with due ceremony in Moscow on April 12 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the true picture of the DPRK, stamps celebrating the Day of the Sun and showing the DPRK-Russia friendship and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were figures of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and a Russian university and masses and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid homage to them.
					
					 The directors of the International Affairs Department and the Information Department of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung performed the immortal exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The exhibition will offer an opportunity for the Russian people to know better about the friendly DPRK, they said, wishing the Korean people greater successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation united close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Ethiopia, Indonesia
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Ethiopia, Indonesia
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Ethiopia and Indonesia on April 7 and 8 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The chief of the group of the Bole branch of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that the President brightly indicated the way of progressive mankind by founding the immortal Juche idea and energetically led the cause of anti-imperialist independence.
					
					 The chief of the group of a branch of the committee said that the President rendered material and moral assistance to the African people in their struggle for achieving national independence and building a new society. The President is always alive in the hearts of the progressive people of the world as he performed exploits for the cause of human independence, the chief noted.
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company stated that April 15 is not only the auspicious holiday of the Korean people but the one of the progressive people of the world, praising the exploits performed by the President.

articles.title: Seminars on Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Held in Switzerland, Spain
articles.content:
Seminars on Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Held in Switzerland, Spain
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars on works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were held by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain on March 25 and April 9.
					 A reporter and speakers including Martin Lotscher, chief of the Swiss group, referred to the main contents of Kim Il Sung's work "On Dynamically Conducting the Movement for National Reunification among Overseas Compatriots."
					
					 They underscored the need to deeply study and widely introduce the exploits the great leaders performed in achieving national reunification and the idea of Marshal Kim Jong Un on national reunification.
					
					 They expressed the will to denounce the reckless moves of the south Korean puppet forces against reunification and dynamically conduct the solidarity movement for supporting the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The chief of the Spanish group explained the detailed contents of Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" and said that the work serves as an important one as it indicated the position and role of the popular masses in the socio-historic development and the way for realizing independence of the popular masses.
					
					 The speakers vowed to disclose the reactionary nature of the corrupted capitalist politics and conduct brisk activities for widely introducing the validity and great vitality of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated articles to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Syrian newspaper Al Thawrah on April 5 said under the title of "The DPRK celebrates the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, great man who turned the country into a power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence":
					
					 The Korean people and world progressives celebrate with splendor the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, in April every year.
					
					 The President was the distinguished thinker and theoretician as he brightly indicated the way of mankind by founding the Juche idea.
					
					 He liberated the country, built the genuine people's country and brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history.
					
					 He regarded it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven and devoted his all to their happiness.
					
					 Lots of people admired his noble personality, warm humanity and broad magnanimity and noble internationalist sense of obligation.
					
					 Those who met with the President were deeply fascinated with his personality as a great man.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al Akhbar Al Massay on March 28 and the Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on April 1 carried articles titled "Valuable life of great President Kim Il Sung" and "President Kim Il Sung and a Japanese".

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in India, Switzerland, Mexico
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in India, Switzerland, Mexico
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in India, Switzerland and Mexico on April 8 and 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 On display in the venue of the events were photos of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the army and people of the DPRK in their struggle for ushering in the golden age for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched a Korean film "Kimilsungia".
					
					 Present there were figures of the Indian Institute for Foreign Policy Studies, the Switzerland-Korea Committee, the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and masses.
					
					 Framoda Patel, director of the Indian Institute for Foreign Policy Studies, referred to the immortal exploits performed by the President for the era and history and praised him as the greatest man in the 20th century.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, said that the President founded the Workers' Party of Korea and led it to victory.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said the President developed the DPRK into a dignified socialist power under the banner of independence.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Nigeria, Angola, Senegal
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Nigeria, Angola, Senegal
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place at the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, a general hospital in Zamfara State, Nigeria and a construction company of Nigeria, a construction company of Angola and the Construction Department of the Ministry of Town Planning and Housing on April 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films "The 70th Founding Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea Was Celebrated with Splendor in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "The Song of the Sun Will Be Eternal", "Eternal Treasures in Praise of the Sun" and "Munsu Water Park".
					
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria said that the President is the father of socialist Korea demonstrating its dignity as the country of Juche.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind as the great sun of the Korean nation and the pioneer of the cause of independence.
					
					 Gifts preserved at the International Friendship Exhibition House, eternal treasure of praising the sun, are associated with the boundless reverence of progressive mankind for the President.
					
					 The International Friendship Exhibition House brings the great pride to not only the Korean people but also progressives.

articles.title: Swedish Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Swedish Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A Swedish preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Stockholm on April 9.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, Erik Anderson, executive member of the Communist Party in Sweden, and Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary careers and exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu on the main occasions in 2017.

articles.title: Austrian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Austrian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- An Austrian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Vienna on April 11.
					 Thomas Losh, general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK who doubles as chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary careers and exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and introduce the DPRK on the occasions of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and the state.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con presidente de Grupo de Inversion General de Italia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con presidente de Grupo de Inversion General de Italia
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 16 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el presidente del Grupo de Inversion General de Italia, Giancarlo Elia Valori, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita VII Congreso de Partido Comunista de Cuba
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita VII Congreso de Partido Comunista de Cuba
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio este sabado un mensaje de felicitacion al VII Congreso del Partido Comunista de Cuba. 
					La misiva expresa la confianza de que el VII Congreso del PCC sera un motivo importante en la lucha del partido y pueblo de Cuba por fortalecer el partido, defender las conquistas de la revolucion y construir Cuba socialista prospera. 
					
					Convencido de que en adelante tambien se consolidaran y se desarrollaran invariablemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y dos pueblos, establecidas en la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo, desea de todo corazon grandes exitos en la marcha del Congreso.

articles.title: Queda solo ruina final a banda de Park Geun-hye, subraya CRPP
articles.content:
Queda solo ruina final a banda de Park Geun-hye, subraya CRPP
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- Como trascendidos, en las elecciones parlamentarias efectuadas el dia 13 en el Sur de Corea, el conservador "Partido Saenuri" en el poder sufrio gran derrota y las fuerzas de los partidos opositores tomaron la superioridad predominante.
					Los tipejos del "Partido Saenuri" quedaron privados de la posicion del primer partido politico en la "Asamblea Nacional", a contrapelo de su insistencia en que alcanzarian los mayores escanos. Para colmo, fueron derrotados en Seul y hasta en las zonas llamadas como bases de apoyo.
					
					El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) en la informacion no. 1104, fechada 16, senalo que el resultado significa la sentencia rotunda y dura a Park Geun-hye y sus compinches del "Partido Saenuri" que nadan en contra de la opinion publica y la corriente de la epoca y continuo:
					
					En las pasadas elecciones presidenciales titeres, la banda de Park tomo el poder con las enganosas promesas como la "unificacion de habitantes", la "epoca de felicidad de la poblacion" y la "mejora de relaciones Sur-Norte basada en la confianza", pero lo que hizo durante el periodo de su mandato es la rehabilitacion de la dictadura de "Yusin" y la ejecucion de politicas antipopulares, la confrontacion fratricida y las maniobras belicas.
					
					Los titeres convirtieron la sociedad surcoreana en la fascista donde se violan y se exterminan la libertad y los derechos democraticos mas elementales y en el infierno en que la economia y vida del pueblo se encuentran en la crisis peor, ocurren sucesivamente las catastrofes y crimenes de mayor envergadura y reina un ambiente muy degenerado, lo que es la realidad tragica del Sur de Corea.
					
					Es una ley que los criminales y los que se oponen a la opinion publica reciben el castigo duro.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos reventaron esta vez la colera acumulada contra la banda de Park Geun-hye y dio el castigo duro al "Poder" traidor.
					
					Park y el "Partido Saenuri", condenados a duras penas por la opinion publica, no tienen el futuro sino les queda solo la ruina final.

articles.title: IRP revela crimenes de lesa humanidad de banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
IRP revela crimenes de lesa humanidad de banda de Park Geun-hye 
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publica el dia 16 una carta blanca para revelar con datos concretos los tremendos crimenes de la banda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye que convirtio el suelo surcoreano en el infierno humano. 
					Segun la nota, en el Sur de Corea la economia se encuentra en la peor crisis, la poblacion vive en la penuria, ocurren sucesivamente los accidentes tragicos y reinan los crimenes, las depravaciones e inmoralidades de toda indole. 
					
					Park Geun-hye llevo la economia surcoreana al dilema, a contrapelo de su insistencia en la "rehabilitacion economica". 
					
					Debido a la firma del avasallante "Tratado de Libre Comercio", el 83% de las variedades mercantiles del Sur de Corea fue retirado en la competicion comercial y el mas de 50 % de las empresas de exportacion sufre danos. 
					
					El empeoramiento economico de los paises vecinos afecto a la economia surcoreana, debido a lo cual el valor de exportacion se reduce de continuo, y en febrero de este ano, se disminuyo el 12.2 % mas que en el mismo mes del ano pasado. 
					
					Durante tres anos de mandato de Park Geun-hye, la proporcion anual del crecimiento economico llego a menos de dos tercios que en los periodos de mandato de Kim Dae Jung y Roh Moo Hyun y es inferior que en el tiempo de mandato de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					A finales del ano pasado, 54 empresas grandes se enfrentaron con la crisis de bancarrota con el incremento de 37% en comparacion con el ano 2012, las otras 567 no pudieron pagar el credito con sus propias ganancias, y mas de 2 mil companias pequenas y medianas se encontraron colectivamente en la quiebra, causando la bancarrota de mas de 90 mil companias de industria manufacturera. 
					
					Ahora el numero de desempleados llega a mas de 4 millones 500 con el aumento de 23.3% en comparacion con el ano 2013. Y los subempleados llegan a 10 millones. 
					
					En particular, la tasa de desempleo de los jovenes marca el record de 12.5%. 
					
					Ahora las deudas del Sur de Corea llegan a la cifra astronomica que la poblacion surcoreana debe pagar durante varios anos sin hacer algun consumo.
					
					Debido a la ruptura de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, mas de 6 mil empresas caen en la crisis de bancarrota y mas de 124 mil obreros quedaron desempleados en un dia. 
					
					La destruccion de la cooperacion economica con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea causo los danos directos o indirectos valorados en decenas de mil millones de US$.
					
					Durante tres anos de mandato de Park Geun-hye, la vida de la poblacion surcoreana se ha empeorado mas que nunca. 
					
					Ahora en el Sur de Corea mas de 5 millones 700 mil personas pertenecen a la capa de pobres absolutos y unos millones de personas no se liberan de la pobreza aunque trabajan mucho.
					
					La diferencia de ingreso entre los ricos y los pobres se aumento a 12 veces desde 8.8 veces de hace 10 anos y un punado de los ricos ocupa el 45 por ciento de toda la ganancia, de manera que el Sur de Corea se evalua como pais con la mas  grave desigualdad en la region asiatica.
					
					  Despues de que Park Geun-hye ocupo Chongwadae, en el territorio surcoreano ocurrieron sucesivamente la catastrofe de gran tamano y los accidentes haciendo temblar por la inquietud y el susto a los habitantes.
					
					  El ejemplo tipico es la gran catastrofe del hundimiento del barco "Sewol" de abril de 2014 que espanto a todo el mundo.
					
					  En 2015 ocurrieron 2 mil 740 accidentes maritimos de barcos, 2 veces mas que 2012 y 112 personas murieron o desaparecieron.
					
					  En un ano y medio y pico del mandato de Park Geun-hye ocurrieron mas de 50 accidentes de gran tamano de varios tipos.
					
					  Hoy en dia el Sur de Corea se llama como primera region del accidente de trafico en el mundo.
					
					  El numero de obreros damnificados por las calamidades industriales en 2014 llego a mas de 240 personas como promedio diario y a mas de 90 mil en un ano.
					
					  Esta en boga toda clase de depravaciones e inmoralidades.
					
					  Despues de la toma del poder por parte de Park Geun-hye, ocurrieron cada dia mas de 6 mil incidentes criminales de todo tipo y mas de 2 millones cada ano.
					
					  El tamano de la economia ilegal con la prostitucion, el juego de azar, el narcotico y otros negocios llega a 390 mil millones al aumentarse en 26 por ciento en comparacion con 2012.
					
					  Ahora el Sur de Corea se llama primer "reino de suicidio" en el mundo con mas de 15 mil suicidas en un ano.
					
					  Aunque convirtio el Sur de Corea en el infierno de la humanidad y el fondo de zanja corrupto, la banda de Park Geun-hye aboga por los "derechos humanos" de alguien y todavia disparatea sobre el "crecimiento de la economia poniendo en su centro el empleo" y la "construccion de la sociedad feliz y vigorosa".
					
					  Esto es la culminacion de cinismo.
